it.polimi.se2019.network.server

Interface ServerEventsListenerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerEventsListener

    public interface ServerEventsListenerInterface
    Interface that specifies the methods to receive events from the clients.
    Author:
    Desno365

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClientConnection(AbstractConnectionToClient client)
      Called when the client start the connection with the server.
      void onConnectionLost(AbstractConnectionToClient client)
      Called when the client lose the connection with the server.
      void onMessageReceived(AbstractConnectionToClient client, Message message)
      Called when receiving a message from the client.

    • Method Detail

      • onClientConnection

        void onClientConnection(AbstractConnectionToClient client)
        Called when the client start the connection with the server.
        Parameters:
        client - the client starting the connection.

      • onConnectionLost

        void onConnectionLost(AbstractConnectionToClient client)
        Called when the client lose the connection with the server.
        Parameters:
        client - the client that lost the connection.

      • onMessageReceived

        void onMessageReceived(AbstractConnectionToClient client,
                       Message message)
        Called when receiving a message from the client. This method will process messages of type GAME_CONFIG or NICKNAME. Other messages are forwarded to the VirtualView.
        Parameters:
        client - the client that sent the message.
        message - the message received.
